name: Gametools
body:
### The Gametools Java Library
Gametools is a lightweight and simple to use library for creating 2D games in Java.

Some features of this library include:
- Sprites
- Image and spritesheet loading
- Collision handling
- Keyboard and mouse input
- Image rotation and manipulation
- Minimal setup code
- Sprite grouping and automation
- Sound
- Animation

### Resources
A full list of help and resources:
- [View GitHub page](https://github.com/Daniel-Oliynyk/GameTools)
- [Download full source code as zip](https://github.com/Daniel-Oliynyk/GameTools/zipball/master)
- [Download full source code as tar](https://github.com/Daniel-Oliynyk/GameTools/tarball/master)
- [Browse the library javadoc](javadoc/index.html)
- [Download the latest library jar](GameTools.jar)
